headline.main: VAST DEFENSE SEEN IN SHIFT OF WAVELL; Plan to Thwart Germans in Lands Between Egypt and India Discerned in Move VAST DEFENSE SEEN IN SHIFT OF WAVELL

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, July 2 -- The transfer of General Sir Archibald Percival Wavell's command from the Middle East to India is believed here to result from a combination of political and strategical necessities.
abstract: move seen as plan to thwart German moves between Egypt and India

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

snippet: ANKARA, Turkey, July 2 -- The transfer of General Sir Archibald Percival Wavell's command from the Middle East to India is believed here to result from a combination of political and strategical necessities....

byline.original: By C.L. SULZBERGERSpecial Broadcast to THE NEW YORK TIMES
